name: boax
description:
Hello everyone,

I worked on this project for about a month, I didn't fully complete everything I wanted to (such as powerups, different kinds of challenges, etc.) but the game IS playable at its current stage.

You and your friends can download it, and setup a room and join in. The person creating the room can edit the properties (such as map type, score needed to win, etc.).

The gameplay is very simple, you use your bombs to try and throw your friends to the lava. Last one standing wins the round.

This game was made using Unity, and also Photon for the networking components.

Enjoy :)
